publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7443 Jack McConnell: Congratulations to Challenges Worldwide on its 10th Anniversaryâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish charity, Challenges Worldwide, on its 10th anniversary on 23 November 2010; notes that in its first decade it has placed more than 600 expert volunteers in companies and organisations across the developing world and emerging economies; recognises the contribution that it makes to economic growth and strengthening organisations, and considers that it is an excellent example of Scottish innovation in global development.
S3M-7443 Congratulations to Challenges Worldwide on its 10th Anniversary (lodged on 19 November 2010) Linda Fabiani*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-7443 Congratulations to Challenges Worldwide on its 10th Anniversary (lodged on 19 November 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
